overview_of_class: Studies in Dance is an opportunity for advanced research in practice. Project proposals are submitted for directed, creative laboratory work on and off campus. All projects involve demonstration of learning that is unique to the proposal. All students will engage in a reflection process. Discussion and other written assignments may be included, as well as a portfolio approach to documentation of the work.
name: Studies in Dance
title: SoC DANCE 465-0-20 Studies in Dance
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Dance and Theater Majors and Minors & Music Theatre Certificate Students
Add Consent: Instructor Consent Required

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Studies in Dance is an opportunity for advanced research in practice. Project proposals are submitted for directed, creative laboratory work on and off campus. All projects involve demonstration of learning that is unique to the proposal. All students will engage in a reflection process. Discussion and other written assignments may be included, as well as a portfolio approach to documentation of the work.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Must be upper division - junior, senior or graduate student

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value:
Conduct an investigation that requires synthesis, reflection and editing.
Design a process that supports creative work.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value:
Review evidence of synthesis, reflection and editing.
Assess documentation of process and product, including performance or other embodied research.

subject: DANCE
